title: Did riot accidentally release vintage championship riven?
body: I understand there is a 2016 version. When I logged into my client today I noticed there was another one in the shop, but it didn't say "2016". So I bought it and sure enough it has the border and crown.

replies.body: Yup...we accidentally put it on the store. The skin will be removed, and anyone who bought it during this time will get a full refund and 1350+ skin, whoops

> [{quoted}](name=nerp1186,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ddyRbhAE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-02T21:49:39.045+0000)
>
> Yup...we accidentally put it on the store. The skin will be removed, and anyone who bought it during this time will get a full refund and 1350+ skin, whoops

Time for me to buy it so I get a free skin.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Wow a new rioter and I was the first one to give an upvote. 
{{sticker:vayne-pose}}
Did you perhaps log into the PBE?

No, they did accidentally release it.

For OP, the skin will be removed, but you will be given a full refund, as well as a free 1350 skin for a champion you own.
